channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO

item.title: Report X-2024080261
item.description:
Report X-2024080261

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-08T15:13:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-28
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment is a multipiece of 2 packages. Second Trk# 777626285836. The box came open during sort operations due to failure of the tape used to secure the outer packaging. Both boxes were opened and revealed a 50 lb/25 kg paper bag (UN5M2) inside each box, marked and labelled as UN 3077 Enviromentally Hazardous Substance Solid (Zinc Oxide). NO RELEASE. Both packages are being held for FAA investigation.
